rule.name: ABA_cleanFolderName
rule.definition:
with( local!specialChar1:{"\"}, local!specialChar2:{"/"}, local!specialChar3:{";"}, local!specialChar4:{","}, local!specialChar5:{":"}, local!specialChar6:char(34), local!specialChar7:{"“"}, local!specialChar8:{"|"}, local!specialChar9:{"?"}, local!specialChar10:{"'"}, local!specialChar11:{"’"}, local!specialChar12:{">"}, local!specialChar13:{"<"}, local!specialChar14:{"*"},
local!a1:stripwith(ri!name,local!specialChar1), local!a2:stripwith(local!a1,local!specialChar2), local!a3:stripwith(local!a2,local!specialChar3), local!a4:stripwith(local!a3,local!specialChar4), local!a5:stripwith(local!a4,local!specialChar5), local!a6:stripwith(local!a5,local!specialChar6), local!a7:stripwith(local!a6,local!specialChar7), local!a8:stripwith(local!a7,local!specialChar8), local!a9:stripwith(local!a8,local!specialChar9), local!a10:stripwith(local!a9,local!specialChar10), local!a11:stripwith(local!a10,local!specialChar11), local!a12:stripwith(local!a11,local!specialChar12), local!a13:stripwith(local!a12,local!specialChar13), local!a14:stripwith(local!a13,local!specialChar14), local!a14 )
